name: Rottweiler
description: The Rottweiler is confident, loyal, and courageous. With early socialization and consistent training, they become devoted family guardians and excel in obedience, protection, and working roles.

adaptability.description: Rottweilers handle cool weather well thanks to their dense coat. In hot climates, schedule exercise during cooler hours and provide shade and fresh water.

diet.title: DIET
diet.mainDescription: Rottweilers thrive on a lean, protein-rich, and balanced diet that supports muscle mass, joint health, and steady energy without excess weight gain.

tips.title: Prioritize lean protein
tips.description: Aim for 22–28% protein in active adults to maintain strong muscles. Choose chicken, turkey, fish, or lamb formulas.

tips.title: Joint support is key
tips.description: Large breeds benefit from Omega-3s, glucosamine, and chondroitin to support hips and elbows.

tips.title: Controlled calories
tips.description: Use measured portions and low-calorie treats to prevent excess weight that can stress joints.

tips.title: Life-stage nutrition
tips.description: Puppies need large-breed formulas with balanced calcium/phosphorus; seniors may benefit from lower calories and added joint support.

training.title: ROTTWEILER TRAINING
training.mainDescription: Rottweilers are intelligent and driven. Early socialization, structure, and positive reinforcement build a calm, reliable companion.

tips.title: Structured obedience & socialization
tips.description: Practice daily cues (sit, stay, heel, place) and expose them to varied people, dogs, and environments from a young age.

tips.title: Physical & mental outlets
tips.description: Provide 60–90 minutes of activity: structured walks, fetch, tracking games, and puzzle toys to channel working instincts.

grooming.title: GROOMING
grooming.subtitle: Short, dense double coat; low maintenance but regular care keeps skin and coat healthy.
grooming.mainDescription: Rottweilers have a short double coat that benefits from weekly brushing and routine hygiene.

tips.title: Weekly brushing
tips.description: Brush once or twice a week to remove loose hair and distribute natural oils; increase during seasonal shedding.

tips.title: Skin, ear & nail care
tips.description: Bathe every 4–6 weeks with gentle shampoo, clean ears weekly, and trim nails regularly to prevent overgrowth.
